title: Nineteen Lincolns
description: portrait of blue-eyed, bearded man dressed as President Lincoln; man seated looking to PR with clasped hands resting in lap on PL thigh; gold watch chain attached to vest; wheat tassel inserted though hole in PL lapel; blurry line of trees and blue sky in distance; blurry tree branch in URC; framed behind glass in black wood frame; one of a set of 18 photographs to be displayed together
creditline: The Shirley Mahowald and Henry Kinsell Endowment for Art Acquisition
